page.title: 05THURLBY C.P.SCHOOL.
page.content: The school is split in two.The two Infant classes are on Lawrance Park and the three Junior classes are in the old school.There are 152 children aged 5 to eleven in the school.The old school was built in 1877.The old school is on Station Road.At the back of the main school there is a playground,a garden and out door toilets.In fine weather we can play in the garden or eat our dinner there.We have to bring our sandwiches since school meals were stopped.We go to Lawrance Park Hall for PE,Games Music and Assembly.The New School will be built onto the hall in October this year.When the children are eleven they are selected for the Grammar or Secondary School in Bourne.Some children go by bus others have to get there by themselves as they do not live far enough away to have a buspass
